title: My friend got hacekd
body:
K so my friend got hacked by being an absolute idiot and clicking on a message from his friend saying it'll get him 6000 rp

so I think you can guess the rest.

we already tried doing riot support, went across live chat with customer support but since i'm a friend I guess I can't do much.

anyone care to help?

replies.body: You won't be able to do an account recovery for your friend's account. They will need to hit up those account recovery agents in a #[**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) on their own to start the process.
